title: Web browsers drop mysterious company with ties to U.S. military contractor
description: TrustCor Systems was a root certificate authority, a key position in internet infrastructure. But details about the company raised questions about where it is based and who it works with.

title: Japanese company launches moon lander on a SpaceX rocket
description: The lander is not expected to reach the moon for five months. If it successfully lands on the lunar surface, it would be a first for a private company's vehicle.

title: What is Discord, the voice and text chat app popular with gamers?
description: Here's how to get started with Discord, one of the Twitter alternatives users are considering since Elon Musk took over the social media platform.

title: Big-screen Kindles return as notebooks, but they’re better for reading
description: Amazon's fan-favorite reading gadget got its first major overhaul in years, but its competition is fierce.

title: Twitter needs Apple more than Apple needs Twitter
description: Apple holds the key to its App Store and its advertising budget, both items Elon Musk needs if he's to make a success of his Twitter purchase.
